rooms.description: Spacious open-plan living area with an adjoining dining space, decorated in luxury finishes and large window openings to ensure ample natural light. The room is oriented towards the east as per Vastu principles.
Luxury dining area with elegant seating and high ceilings. Positioned next to the living room for a seamless transition.
Fully-equipped modern kitchen featuring top-of-the-line appliances, designed in an open layout adjoining the dining area. Kitchen is placed in a functional corner to maintain energy flow.
Master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet, and private balcony. Placed towards the north for positive energy.
Luxury bedroom with ample natural light from east-facing windows, designed for privacy and relaxation. Placed in a quiet area of the farmhouse.
Additional bedroom suitable for joint family members, designed with comfortable space and an attached small balcony. Positioned in a less disturbed area.
A compact but functional bedroom catering to joint family needs, with sufficient storage and natural lighting. Placed in proximity to communal spaces.
Spare bedroom for guests or additional family members, designed with flexible space and a small sitting area. Oriented towards the south to balance energy.
Additional bedroom for joint family members, ensuring privacy and comfort, with natural light considerations as per Vastu principles. Placed in the south-east quadrant.
A dedicated library space featuring built-in bookshelves, comfortable seating, and a reading nook. Positioned in the north-west corner to promote concentration and balance.
Modern ensuite bathroom for the master bedroom with luxury fixtures, natural lighting, and privacy. Adheres to Vastu by placing it away from main living areas.
Additional bathroom accessible from the guest bedroom and common areas, ensuring convenience for joint family members. Placed in a less active zone.
General washroom facility strategically located near the kitchen and dining area, with easy access for joint family use. Complies with Vastu by being positioned in a supportive zone.
Compact utility room near the kitchen to store cleaning supplies and maintenance tools, ensuring smooth operations. Placed in a functional corner as per design norms.
Well-organized storage space for household items and seasonal goods, designed with easy access from multiple areas of the farmhouse. Placed in a central yet discreet location.

An open courtyard at the center of the farmhouse, acting as a natural gathering space with lush greenery and water features. This space is designed to enhance ventilation and natural light across all rooms.

openings.description: Luxurious entrance gateway designed to welcome guests, with a wide pathway leading to the central courtyard. Positioned on the western side for positive energy.
Dedicated driveway that ensures privacy and ease of access from the main road to the farmhouse entrance.
